com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.emx.util.io

Class DelimitedWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.emx.util.io.DelimitedWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public class DelimitedWriter
extends Writer
    A Writer subclass for writing TSV (and CSV) files. Behaves similarly to a PrintWriter.
    Author:
    Christopher J Burton, 20/Jun/2002.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class java.io.Writer
